<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Usage">5644a3a71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb05</macroponent><name>tab3showVerticalCSupportingMetric2Chart</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var indicator = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalC.supportingMetrics[1].metricSysid;
    var breakdown = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalC.supportingMetrics[1].breakdownSysid;

    var datasources = [{
        "metrics": [{
            "dataSource": "tab3datasourceID_VCSM2",
            "id": "tab3metricID_VCSM2",
            "aggregateIndicator": "",
            "frequency": 10,
            "numberFormat": {
                "customFormat": false
            },
            "axisId": "primary"
        }],
        "datasources": [{
            "sourceType": "indicator",
            "uuid": {
                "indicator": indicator,
                "breakdowns": []
            },
            "id": "tab3datasourceID_VCSM2"
        }],
        "trendBy": {
            "trendByFrequency": "date",
            "trendByFields": [{
                "field": "anything",
                "metric": "tab3metricID_VCSM2"
            }]
        },
        "groupBy": [{
            "maxNumberOfGroups": 10,
            "numberOfGroupsBasedOn": "NO_OF_GROUP_BASED_ON_PER_METRIC",
            "showOthers": false,
            "hideZeroValues": false,
            "groupBy": [{
                "dataSource": "tab3datasourceID_VCSM2",
                "groupByField": breakdown,
                "isRange": false,
                "isPaBucket": false
            }]
        }]
    }]

    api.setState("tab3verticalCSupportingMetric2", datasources);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-05 14:45:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cf6463e71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tab3showVerticalCSupportingMetric2Chart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cf6463e71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb73</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-05 14:45:55</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
